Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel

Class OpponentModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.OpponentModel
public class OpponentModel extends Object
OpponentModel represents an image of the information about the other players in the lobby. Obviously, a player doesn't know all information about each player, for example each player's objective is secret.
